meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Floyd Jen Kaufmann Meagan Shelton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4114.

td.p: Eric Floyd, a college student from Calhoun, Georgia
Jen Kaufmann, a mom from Oak Brook, Illinois
Meagan Shelton, a college student from Durant, Oklahoma (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,601)

tr.td: CITY QUOTES
COUNTRY SINGERS ON FILM
EXPLORERS
"HIGH" ANXIETY
'20s TRANSPORTATION
STUPID ANSWERS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Radio comedian Fred Allen said this part of L.A. is "A great place to live--if you\'re an orange"')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_4_2', 'clue_DJ_4_2_stuck', '(Eric: What are Washington, Jefferson, Roosevelt and Lincoln?)
(Jen: What is chronological? Order?)
(Alex: I need you to give me the order.)
(Jen: Oh!)
(Alex: We know the order. We want you to name it.)
(Jen: Um, what is Washing--Washington, Jefferson, Roosevel--Li--)
(Alex: [Interrupting] No.)
(Jen: Uh!)
(Alex: Sorry.)

Washington, Jefferson, Lincoln and Roosevelt

MeaganJenEric
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
